section.title: Anyframe Query Manager Nature
section.para: Project Nature makes Plugin regard the project as one of specific kind. Project utilizing Anyframe Query Service defines Nature of Anyframe Query Manage, thereby providing useful functions for the project.
The main goal of setting Anyframe Query Manager Nature is to use Anyframe Builder function provided in Anyframe Query Manager at the project (Java Project).

section.title: Defining Anyframe Query Manager Nature
section.para: To apply Anyframe Query Manager Nature to specific Java project, select "Anyframe Query Manager > Add Anyframe Query Manager Nature" on Context Menu of the project. When Anyframe Query Manager Nature is activated and applied, the function of "Anyframe Builder" is applied to the project. To deselect Anyframe Query Manager Nature, select "Anyframe Query Manager > Remove Anyframe Query Manager Nature" on Context Menu.
